Fault.name: BPEL/CoherenceBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Make sure that the expression in <bpel:condition> is a boolean expression.
Fault.msg: The expression $InvokeCoherenceGet_Get_OutputVariable.body/clie ... in <bpel:condition> is not a boolean expression.

Fault.name: BPEL/CoherenceBPELProcess.bpel
Fault.fix: Add a predicate to select an element from the sequence.
Fault.msg: The XPath segment "child::ns4:Person" selects a sequence of elements - a predicate MAY be needed to correctly select an element.
